Student Projects

We had 4 final student projects executed out of 11 proposed that were featured as part of the classâ€™ participation in the 14th School of Computing Term Project Showcase (14 STePS).

Thank you to all of the students who worked on the project and finished theirs to completion! We had a single prize and two runner ups:

Winner: Deep Q Network Flappy Bird by Lee Yong Ler.

Runner Up: A curriculum-based approach to learning a universal policy by Bala, Joash Lee, Kishaloy Halder and Lim Joo Gek.

Runner Up: Imitation Learning by By Liangming Pan, Tan Ying Kiat, Chong Yihui, Goh Yong Liang.
